title: Quit dodging you crybabies
body: I swear, I have to go through 3 queues every time I play One For All because someone gets salty that nobody wanted to play their champ. I want to try random people like Vel Koz and Zilean, sorry that I didn't want your tryhard Morgana

replies.body: r u hot gril? i wudnt dodge u bby ;)

I knew there was gonna be problems in this gamemode. Really wish it would have been sort of like team builder where you can play with other people who want to play the same thing you're playing. I don't want to play Vi and grab one person till they die, I want to throw an entire team into a wall with Gnar and have everyone else jump in and throw them into the wall as well.

I've suggested OfA teambuild repeatedly, and have a thread devoted to it, along with threads for a couple other approaches to the problem, but all I get are downvotes. Everyone cries about this, but when someone proposes a solution, it's shot down. What a waste of time discussing it.
IDK why they wouldn't want to play velkoz lol, he destroys in OFA.
